text: Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa arrā ga o konomi ni naranai kagiri, jibun jishin no tame no rigai sura jiyū ni dekinai. Watashi ga moshi yūgen-kai o shitte irunaraba, watashi wa yoi koto o mashi, mata saiyaku ni awanakattadearou. Watashi wa tada no hitori no keikoku-sha de, shinkō suru mono e no kippō o shiraseru hitori no dentatsu-sha ni suginai
